channel.title: ceo on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in ceo on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-11
item.description: Moxie Marlinspike steps down as CEO of Signal (2 minute read) Moxie Marlinspike is stepping down as CEO of Signal, leaving executive chairman Brian Acton to serve as acting CEO until a replacement is found.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-13
item.description: Jim Lanzone breaks up with Tinder, swipes right to take the CEO job at Yahoo, Renate Nyborg takes Tinder CEO role (3 minute read) Jim Lanzone, the current CEO of Tinder, has been appointed the new CEO for Yahoo under Apollo Global.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-13
item.description: Nvidia Reveals Its CEO Was Computer Generated in Keynote Speech (2 minute read) Nvidia’s GTC conference in April featured a keynote presentation by its CEO Jensen Huang.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-09
item.description: Square is going to make a hardware wallet for bitcoin (1 minute read) Square is making a hardware wallet for bitcoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-03
item.description: Amazon will have a new CEO as Jeff Bezos transitions to executive chair later this year (2 minute read) Jeff Bezos will step down as CEO and become the executive chair of the Amazon board in Q3 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-10
item.description: McDonald’s confirms creation of McPlant plant-based burger, unveils new Crispy Chicken Sandwich will debut in 2021 (6 minute read) McDonald’s announced a new plant-based burger and a new Crispy Chicken Sandwich during its virtual investor update on Monday.
